Name: The Mayflower Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fragrant balance of fruits and flowers.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Wayne Collins in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Mayflower Martini contains 177 calories
